Job Requirements: Minimum of 2 years of experience in Database Development.
Proficiency in Business Intelligence (BI) and related technologies.
Strong understanding of ETL - Extract, Transform, Load processes.
Familiarity with data visualization tools such as Looker and Tableau.
Proven skills in data visualization and interactive data visualization.
Extensive experience in writing and optimizing SQL queries.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field is preferred.

Company Information.Description: Robert Half is the world's first and largest specialized talent solutions firm that connects highly qualified job seekers to opportunities at great companies.
